# APP Product Categories


## Add new APP product categories


**Interface address**:`/business-admin/appProductType/add`


**Request method**: `POST`


**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Example**:


```javascript
{
  "appId": "",
  "distributionNetMode": "",
  "guideType": "",
  "id": "",
  "imageUrl": "",
  "name": "",
  "productTypeId": "",
  "productTypeIds": [],
  "protocol": "",
  "sortNum": 0,
  "status": 0
}
```


**Request Parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|appProductTypeDTO|DeviceMetaData|body|true|DeviceMetaDTO|DeviceMetaDTO|
|  appId|Application ID||false|string||
|  distributionNetMode|Network distribution mode (1=wifi+ble, 2=wifi, 3=ble) comma separated||false|string||
|  guideType|Network configuration guide type: 1 standard rn; 2 custom rn||false|string||
|  id|app category ID||false|string||
|  imageUrl|icon||false|string||
|  name|app category name||false|string||
|  productTypeId|Superior category ID||false|string||
|  productTypeIds|List of parent category IDs||false|array|string|
|  protocol|protocol encoding||false|string||
|  sortNum|sort||false|integer||
|  status|Status: 0 not available (disabled); 1 available (enabled)||false|integer||


**Response Status**:


| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | 
|200|OK|ResponseResult object«boolean»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||


**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- | 
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|boolean||
|message|Response message|string||
|reqId|Request ID|string||
|time|Request timestamp (10 bits)|integer(int64)|integer(int64)|


**Sample response**:
```javascript
{
	"code": 200,
	"data": true,
	"message": "success",
	"reqId": "4a0ede228f9f6fac",
	"time": 1620641786
}
```

## Batch save


**Interface address**:`/business-admin/appProductTypeGuide/batchSave`


**Request method**: `POST`


**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Example**:


```javascript
[
  {
    "appId": "",
    "configDTO": {
      "buttonText": "",
      "radioText": "",
      "showRadio": true,
      "steps": [
        {
          "aspectRatio": "",
          "imageUrl": "",
          "sortNum": 0,
          "text": ""
        }
      ],
      "subTitle": "",
      "title": ""
    },
    "guideId": "",
    "guideImage": "",
    "guideVideo": "",

    "netModel": 0,
    "refId": ""

]
```
